en.START_COMMAND: Hi, my name is {} and I am a tool for managing groups with many special functions to be discovered and I am Open Source! If you want to see my source type: /source If you need help, type /help

en.SET_MAIN_WELCOME: Group Welcome Instructions: You have to use the command like this /welcome args where args is the text you need to insert it is possible to use special tags that are interpreted by the bot: {username} = user's username {chat} = group name {first_name} = user's first name {userid} = user id {mention} = user mention HTML tags can also be used b , i, code and emojis can also be used EXAMPLE: Welcome {username} in {chat}

it.START_COMMAND: Ciao io mi chiamo {} e sono uno strumento per la gestione dei gruppi con tante funzioni speciali tutte da scoprire e sono Open Source! Se vuoi vedere il mio sorgente digita: /source Se hai bisogno di aiuto digita /help
